mean_cn: n. 惊厥，动乱，震撼，震动
mean_en: a sudden violent shaking of the muscles in your body that you are unable to control
word_etyma: con共同，全部+vuls拉扯+ion表名词 → 整个国家政权被多方拉扯 →动乱；震撼 ；震动
sentence: When my daughter has a fit, I have to make sure her body's convulsions don't hurt her.
sentence_trans: 我女儿病发作的时候，我必须确保她身体的抽搐不会伤到她。
